unnormalised: Okay, koni torui uloilo ki crypto vikto gheunk personal loan gheunchen borem poddtta kai mhunn. LOL. Komedichi baat, bhai? Tem mhunnllear tumchi aajechi retirement fund ghodyancher bet lavunk vaprunk zai kai mhunn vicharche sarke asa, zanche ghode asha ani swapnanche ut'toran chalttat.
normalised: Borem, konnen tori vicharlem crypto gheunk personal loan gheunk zata kai mhunn. L-O-L. Seriously, bhai? Tem mhunnje tuje ajichi retirement fund ghoddiacher bet lavpak vaprupak zata kai mhunn vicharpak sarkem zata zaka axa ani sopnanchi takat asa.

unnormalised: Chala hem foddon sangunk, zai? Poile, bank tumcher interest lavteli, kiteak tori 10-15% varshik, tumche credit score ani tumi loan officeracher kitlem khuxealkaien hassta tacher adharit asa. Credit cards? Tem aniui vaitt, team soddlear te 30-40% APR meren pavunk shaktat. Atam, tumi duddu boro kortat, jem interest kaddtta. Dusre vatten crypto chandran votat, va tem Mariana Trenchentolem sokolten votak daddunk xakta. Koslich jababdari na, mhaje ixtta!
normalised: Chala ami hem thodde bhaganim vantunk, khorekai? Poilech, bank tuka interest ghetole, sumar dha te pandra percent p-a, tuje credit score ani loan officeracher kiteam porim hansuta tacher depend asta. Credit cards? Aniui vait, tankam tis te challis percent A-P-R lagunk shakta. Atam, tu jem udhar korta tem interest actively accrue zata. Crypto, dusrea vatten, chandrak vochpak shakta, vo tem Mariana Trench-ache tellek bhett divpak nirdhar korunk shakta. Konachi guarantee nam, mhojea ixtta!

unnormalised: Kalpan kar: tumi loan gheuta, mhunnllear, Rs. 1 lakh. Tumi kiteak tori Shiba Inu coin gheta kiteak tumcho cousin Vinay uloita ki tem Bitcoin zatolem mhunn. Dusre kiteak tori zannam, Elon Musk thoddem spast uloita, market darak bhienk lagta, ani tumchem investment atam Rs. 25,000 zatolem. Tumi atamui tea Rs. 1 lakh loanak zobabdari dita, ani interest paymentsui! Tumi fukar duddu los korunk puro kortat. Tem Rs. 1000 EMI aikunk dukh dischem, nh√µi?
normalised: Kalpna kor: tu rupee ek lakhachem loan gheta. Tu kaim Shiba Inu coin gheta kiteak tujea cousin Vinay-an sanglam ki tem next Bitcoin mhunn. Dusrem mhunnlear Elon Musk kaim vague tweet korta, market ghabarta, ani tuje investmentachi kimot atam rupee panchis hajar asta. Tu tea purnn rupee ek lakhachea loanak zabadar asta, interest payments-anim zoddun! Tu basicalluch poisso harovpachi privilege-ik extra dita. Tea rupee ek hajar E-M-I-k atam vhoddlem dista, naii?

unnormalised: Annache babtent sod. Tem mhunnllear Linking Road-iche laggi zannaranchem golgappe gheunk loan gheunk sarke, asha korun ki tumi tea golgappe don gunn vaddoun bhukel'lea videshik vikun gheta mhunn. Hem ghoddeunk sandhi unno asa, ani zata zali tor, tumi thodde rupia kamaita, loan ani interest bhorunk puro zatam nhoi.
normalised: Annachea terms-anim vichar kor. Linking Road-ache lagim tea vendorkhanchem plate golgappe gheunk loan gheupak sarkem, tum tankam bhukel'lea videshik duball kimotin viktele mhunn axa korun. Tem ghoddpachim chances slim astat, ani tem zalelearui, tum thodde rupee korunk pavtele, loan ani interest puro korpak poros chodd nhui.

unnormalised: Ani credit cards, oh dear. Mhaka uloi korunk dinakat. Tumi crypto gheta tumche credit card-icher vichar korun ki "Hanv tem fuddele mhoinea bhorunk zatolem". Fuddo mhoino vochta, ani Bitcoin-an sokolten dhompe kortat. Atam, tum ICICI card-icher 3% interest dor mhoinea bhoron minimum payments bhorunk ghanttale asa. Tem mhunnllear dusrem loan gheun poilem loan bhorche sarke zatat.
normalised: Ani credit cards, oh dear. Maka startuch korunk naka. "Hanv next month-ak puro kortolom" mhunn chintun tu credit card-an crypto gheta. Next month eta, ani Bitcoin nosedive korunk lagta. Atam, tum minimum payments-anim tis percent interest dor mhoineak I-C-I-C-I card-anim diunchea khatir ataktai. Tem poilem loan puro korchea khatir dusrem loan gheupak sarkem asta.

unnormalised: Tor, sod kiteak tori? Kiteak tori nhoi. Tum Batman asat, ani tumcher trust fund asa, ani tum risk ghevpak xoktat, tor tumi hea vicharache polle naka. Tumche laggi kitle duddu asat, kiteak tori Rs. 5000 zaunche ani tumi los korunk ditalam mhunn vichar kortam tor, zata mhunn thoddem gamble kara. Punn loan gheun? Tem mhunnllear dukh magunk sarke asa. Ugddas dovra, Dalal Street-iche zannkar investorsui thodde zann asat, te personal loan-ancher visvas dovrat na!
normalised: Tor, verdict kite? Absolutely noi. Tu secret-an Batman astolo ani tujem trust fund asun tuka risky investments-ichi avodd asli mhunnlear soddun dilear, hea idea-posun dusor rav. Tuze kodde kaim extra cash aslem mhunnlear, sumar rupee panch hajar vo titlem tum harovpak chintinaka, tor sure, thodem gamble kor. Pun loan gheun? Tem mhunnje problem-ak invite kortat mhunn. Yaad thev, Dalal Street-antle seasoned investors-ui cautious astat, te personal loans-acher rely korinant!

unnormalised: Tea zagear, tum thoddem mutual funds sarkhea kami asathecher invest kara va SBI-iche borem fixed deposit-icher. Tum thoddem kamaita, ani tumcher tumchi kidney vikon tumche deuda bhorunk poddonam.
normalised: Badlek, kaim kam volatile aslolea vostunim invest kor, mutual funds vo S-B-I-cher ek borem zannvolchem fixed deposit-antui invest kor. Kamit kam tujim returns astolim, ani tujim debts puro korchea khatir tuji kidney vikpaichi goroz poddchina.

unnormalised: Sangta mhunn aik, ek financial advisoracher uloi kara. Te tuka tem mhunnlear, punn thoddem sarcasm kami korun. Ugddas dovra, jevhan tum finance-ik lagun uloita tevhan, tumchi best friend chitr samzon gheuchem mhunn. Ani chitr samzon gheta ki duddu boro korun ek asatthe marketacher gamble korunk gheunk dukh asa mhunn. Atam vochun chai pieun sukh ghe, tum tem favo kortat!
normalised: Seriously, ek financial advisor-ak uloi. Te tuka titlech sangtole, pun thodem kam sarcastic porim. Fokot yaad thev, finance-achem zatka kiteak lagun, common sense tujo boro ixtt. Ani common sense tuka sangta ki volatile market-acher gamble korchea khatir udhar gheun disasterachem recipe bhov bori asta. Atam vo ani tea chai-achi cup piy, tuka tem favo zata!
